attributes.action: Review on Lib-Dem Candidate Maajid Nawaz
attributes.additional_details: The Muslims and other British citizens want a review over Maajid Nawaz actions and want him removed from the post of the Liberal Democrats' Prospective Parliamentary Candidate for Hamstead and Kilburn because of the offensive images he posted on FaceBook/Twitter of the Prophets' Muhammed and Jesus peace be upon them.
